description.narrative: The objective of the project is to secure, improve and extend the sustainable supply of electricity to consumers in Arusha ,Mwanza, Shiniyanga and Dar Es Salaam. The project also aims at helping TANESCO increase its customer base by supplying electricity to new consumers.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire
